==============
Version 5.4.31
==============

* Bug when reading index.html file fixed. Index.html must have a unicode encoding.

* German translation updated.

* Bug when Dashbord are opened fixed in Demo.

* Users item added to demo.

* on_login event handler in task server module that uses Users item to login 
  is written (commented) and changing of password implemented. 
  Uncomment on_login to see how it works. 
  Description is here https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/jam-py/Obkv5d3yT8A
